basic_info.description: I'm a software engineer residing in the Dallas-FortWorth area. I have always been enchanted with the world of technology and innovaton and after graduating from the University of Texas at Arlington, I took the leap and transitioned from the healthcare industry to start my tech journey in late 2022. Fast forward to now, summer 2023, I have expanded my skillset by completing an advanced software engineering immersive where I gained valuable technical skills and development expertise. As a detail-oriented person, I have a passion for developing, designing and maintaining websites/applications with a focus on clean coding practices and user-friendliness. My goal is to continue learning and growing as a software engineer and to contribute to innovative and meaningful projects that make a positive impact on the world. In my free time, I love to read, paint, cook, hangout with friends/family and travel. My 5 year old cat, Luna, loves to sit with me while I'm coding and is my version of a programmer's rubber duck.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
